meta.title: Cedar Fence Installation Toledo OH | Natural Privacy | Ghareeb Fencing
meta.description: Premium Northern White Cedar fence installation in Toledo. Natural rot resistance, 30-40 year lifespan. Privacy, shadowbox & lattice styles. Free quotes.

hero.headline: Cedar Privacy Fence Installation
hero.description: Premium Northern White Cedar from Michigan. Natural rot resistance without chemicals. The beautiful, long-lasting choice for discerning homeowners.

intro.headline: Why Choose Cedar Fencing?
intro.content: Cedar is nature's perfect fencing material. Northern White Cedar contains natural oils that resist rot, decay, and insects without any chemical treatment. It's the premium choice for homeowners who want a beautiful fence that lasts 30-40 years.
intro.content2: We source our cedar directly from Michigan mills - the finest Northern White Cedar available. Every board is hand-selected for quality and appearance.
benefits: Natural rot & insect resistance - no chemicals needed
Beautiful natural grain that weathers to silver-gray

styles.headline: Cedar Fence Styles We Install
styles.subheadline: All styles available in 6' or 8' heights. Custom heights available.

items.name: Solid Privacy
items.description: Full privacy with tight-fitting boards. Classic look, maximum seclusion.

items.name: Shadowbox
items.description: Alternating boards on each side. Looks great from both sides, allows airflow.

items.name: Privacy with Lattice
items.description: Solid privacy with decorative lattice top. Elegant traditional style.

comparison.headline: Cedar Fence Options: Good / Better / Best
comparison.subheadline: Choose the style that fits your needs and budget

tiers.name: Good
tiers.subtitle: Western Red Cedar Privacy
tiers.description: Classic 6ft solid privacy fence with dog-ear pickets. Great value with 20-25 year lifespan.

tiers.name: Better
tiers.subtitle: Northern White Cedar Privacy
tiers.description: Premium Michigan-sourced cedar with superior rot resistance. 30-40+ year lifespan with decorative post caps.

tiers.name: Best
tiers.subtitle: NWC with Lattice Top
tiers.description: Premium privacy fence with elegant lattice accent. Custom framed panels and premium gate hardware.

cta.headline: Ready for Your Cedar Fence?
cta.description: Get a free quote for cedar fence installation. We'll help you choose the perfect style for your property.

materialComparison.headline: Cedar vs. Pressure Treated Pine
materialComparison.subheadline: Why we recommend cedar for homeowners who want the best

materials.name: Cedar (Any Grade)
features: Beautiful warm tone from day one
